author: emiglior
body:
Clean-up of the MuScleFit code (studies on the muon momentum scale)  for run2.
This is the forward port to CMSSW_7_4_X of the PR #8700 which entered in CMSSW_7_2_5.
RECO is not affected.
@maralxplus, @mabarrio This can be of interest for you as well
title: Forward port to CMSSW_74X
